price: Ku kubera ivyo vyose rero, Ndarahiye Jewe Allah ku kuba ari Jewe Rurema Yaremye ijuru n’isi, ko ivyo Nabasezeraniye vyose, ari ukuri mudakwiye kugirako amakenga; nka kurya mutagira amakenga ko muvuga mugatomora.
arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ

meta.transliteration: fawarabbi al-samāi wal-arḍi innahu laḥaqqun mith'la mā annakum tanṭiqūna
